translations: 足球运动员；橄榄球运动员

sentences.sentence: Brazil has thrown up many world-famous footballers.
sentences.translation: 巴西培养了许多世界闻名的足球运动员。

sentences.sentence: The World Cup will be set alight by African footballers.
sentences.translation: 世界杯将会因非洲球员而璀璨。

sentences.sentence: I saw signed photographs of famous footballers in a shop near here.
sentences.translation: 我在附近一家商店看到著名的足球运动员签名的照片。
